div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1202 Marmaris? (anc. Physcus), Caria, c. 1965 Burial: 390-380 B.C. (Cahn) Contents: c. 100 AR Chersonesus, Caria: 13+ dr.; 6+ fr. Cnidus: dr.; fr. Rhodes: hemidr. Unc. mint: "many" fr. (as Trait√© pl. 155, 19 [Clazomenae]) Disposition: dispersed
